scripts.build-lib: (cd src/lib; emcc --bind lib.c -s USE_SDL=2 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=_initialiseCanvas,_renderMandelbrot,_cleanup,_saveImage -s EXPORT_ES6 --emit-tsd ./a.out.d.ts -O3 -sFORCE_FILESYSTEM -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['FS'] -sALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH)
scripts.build-dev-lib: (cd src/lib; emcc --bind lib.c -s USE_SDL=2 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=_initialiseCanvas,_renderMandelbrot,_cleanup,_saveImage -s EXPORT_ES6 --emit-tsd ./a.out.d.ts -g -sFORCE_FILESYSTEM -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['FS'] -sALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH)
scripts.build: npm run build-lib && tsc -b && vite build
